verses.name: Jeremiah 34:5
verses.text: But thou shalt die in peace: and with the burnings of thy fathers, the former kings which were before thee, so shall they burn odours for thee; and they will lament thee, saying, Ah lord! for I have pronounced the word, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 34:6
verses.text: Then Jeremiah the prophet spake all these words unto Zedekiah king of Judah in Jerusalem,

verses.name: Jeremiah 34:7
verses.text: When the king of Babylon’s army fought against Jerusalem, and against all the cities of Judah that were left, against Lachish, and against Azekah: for these defenced cities remained of the cities of Judah.
